title: Why Yasuo should NOT be allowed to ult off other allied knockups.
body:
Yasuo has defensive abilities in his kit like a free shield, projectile windwall. He also has resourceless Q spam that proc's on hit, Conqueror and crits and the cooldown of the Q falls significantly based on how much attack speed he has. He also has unlimited mobility as long as there are enemy targets he can E through. 

Ok, so he has all this bullshit in his kit so why the fuck can he ult off other allied knockups? He has the capability in his kit to set up his own knockups so remove the interaction of Yasuo being able to use allied knockups. Especially when the cooldown is ridiculous anyways at 80/55/30 seconds without CDR. YES 30 second ultimate without CDR that he doesn't need to set up himself. 

And if the ult knockup is not enough, the bullshit champion also gets get 50% bonus armor penetration on crits for 15 seconds to ALL targets not just the ones affected by Last Breath. So you can't build squishy because Yasuo gets 100% crit in 2 items while the rest of the game except Trynda needs like 4 items, you can't build full tank because he has 50% bonus armor penetration. So basically your fucked if squishy or tank.

_What I want to see changed:_
If Yasuo can ult off other allied knockups, increase the cooldown to 120/90/60 OR If Yasuo can't ult off allied knockups, change his Q knockup from Airborne to Tempested. 

The 50% bonus armor penetration should only apply to targets knocked up by Last Breath, not all targets.


I feel like this will give Yasuo proper counterplay, because right now his only counterplay is "Just CC him" but that is counterplay to any champion, and/or "hope he fucks up".

Personally, I think Yasuo should lose the ability to chain off of allied knockups for the basic reason that it adds this entire layer of balance complications just for his sake. Because of Yasuo, every champion with a displacement now needs to have this displacement taken into consideration -- even tiny displacements like Thresh's E, or Trundle's pillar knockback suddenly gain this massive amount of power with Yasuo on the same team, and that simply makes balance much more volatile. Additionally, it means that Yasuo can abuse more reliable displacements to give himself equally reliable CC and damage. It's just not a great idea in execution, and one of the many reasons why Yasuo feels lacking in interactivity.

Because of this, I'd personally remove Yasuo's ability to ult off of allied displacements, and would instead focus on his own power. For example, his ult could then afford to have a much lower cooldown. Overall, I feel Yasuo could be allowed to have even lower cooldowns if he offered better windows of vulnerability in combat.

Here are some suggestions for changes. 

Put his windFlow shield on his windwall so if he want to have a shield that actually scales better in lane he'd need to put points in his W. 
Give him a new passive replacing the crit strike one. Could also add that depending on how much flow you have determines how Long your windwall lasts. 
So a 0.5 windwall if you have little to no flow. 

Change his Q so that is has a cool down of 4 seconds, and tuned by Cooldown and Not by attack speed. 

Make is that so His E is on a charged system, possibly 2 dashes at level 1 and 8 dashes at the max rank.

Yasuo has tons of counterplay.

He gets wrecked by any bruiser. Darius, Renekton, so on and so forth. This is because he has low health and his passive shield is kinda worthless.

Yasuo also has to be in melee range to CS. If you are a ranged champion then you need to harass and harass often. If you successfully harass him he will need to back as he also has no innate sustain and has low health.

Harassing Yasuo is a very interactive experience. He has his E but he can only E to enemy minions, so if you position yourself properly he won't reach you. His E also sets the minion he E'd to on cooldown so he can't E the same minion over and over. If he's dodging your abilities left and right WITH these restrictions, he's outplaying you and you deserve to die. He's just a better player.

Yasuo's W is the ability he maxes last and gets last. Level 1 and 2, it's a nonfactor in how you interact with him. 3+ it's on a 20 second cooldown. Bait it out with any other ability. If you're Ahri, bait it out with W or something. If he W's your CC ability you fucked up, and he deserves to kill you.

Yasuo is also very susceptible to ganks. As he needs to Q enemy minions in order to get his tornado, his kit innately pushes the lane, and he can't E his own minions. He also cannot keep up his tornado for more than 3 seconds so he can't even CC the enemy jungler coming right at him.
